pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Processing and Analyzing Files from the Hydrological Catchment Model HYPE // Work with model files (setup, input, output) from the hydrological catchment model HYPE: Streamlined file import and export, standard evaluation plot routines, diverse post-processing and aggregation routines for hydrological model analysis. The HYPEtools package is also archived at doi:10.5281/zenodo.7627955 and can be cited in publications with Brendel et al. (2024) doi:10.1016/j.envsoft.2024.106094.
